title: Revenge Soldiers
description: The Revenge Soldiers are orphans raised in an isolated community by strict monks with a monstrous secret. In time their individual superpowers emerge, and they are groomed to become hammers of justice, fighters of monsters.But the true monster is in their midst- their brother Johannas. And in the wake of the war he seizes power, systematically killing off enemies and undesirables.Now as the final battle approaches, his crimes against humanity has forced the hands of the remnant. They must confront him and take him down for the sake of everyone, for the future of mankind.
author: Dan Pagano
